title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 17
author: Alexander Leighton
snippet: Passing the Crosscauseway, he got into theKing's Park, and took the Duddingstone road, but seeing two soldierswalking that way, he jumped the dyke and made for Clear Burn.
